original: Johansson, Henry Bernhard, direktör, Göteborg, f. 9/3/89 i Jönköp. av Carl Ludvig J. o. Ida Katarina Pettersson. G. 15 m. Hildur Heibert. — Tekn. aftonsk. 06. Verksam inom konsumentkoop. över tjugo år, chef f. koop. chark:fören. 15-17, f. Gbgs konsumt :fören. chark:avd. fr. dess tillkomst 17, dir. f. Gbgs slakthus samt torg o. saluhallar sed. 37. Led. av slakthusstyr. 22, ordf. 31, led. av torg- o. saluhallsstyr. samt hälsov:-ndn 25, ordf. där 25 resp. 34, huvudman i Gbgs Sparbank 25, bisitt. v. handelsmål, led. av poliskolleg., ordf. i ikris’tidsndn, ersiättn :istyr., v. ordf. i deleg. f. barnhyg., led. av styr. f. Stora teatern i Gbg, styr. f. fören. Sv:es offentl. slakthus, led. av statens livsmed :komm. varuoms :avd. sekt. f. matfett m. m., f. slaktvaror m. m. o. f. div. livsmedel samt f. dess byrå f. lagringsfrågor m. m. sed. 43, led. av riksd. första kamm. (s) sed. 43 m. m.
translated: Johansson, Henry Bernhard, director, Gothenburg, born March 9, 1889 in Jönköping to Carl Ludvig J. and Ida Katarina Pettersson. Married on May 15 to Hildur Heibert. Graduated from a technical evening school in 1906. Active in consumer cooperatives for over twenty years, becoming the head of the cooperative meat association from 1915-1917 and was in charge of Gothenburg's consumer cooperative meat department from its inception in 1917. Became the director for Gothenburg's slaughterhouse and market halls since 1937, being on the slaughterhouse board since 1922 and its chairman since 1931. Was a member of the board of market halls and health committee since 1925, serving as chairman in 1925 and 1934. Head of Gothenburg Savings Bank since 1925, an alternate member for trade cases, member of the police board, chairman of the crisis committee, and compensation management. Vice chairman for the delegation for childcare, member of the board for Gothenburg's Grand Theatre, board member for Sweden's public slaughterhouse association, member of the state's food committee for vegetable oils and more, meat and more, and for its bureau for storage issues since 1943. Member of Parliament's first chamber (social democrats) since 1943.

memberOf.name: State's Food Committee for vegetable oils and more, meat and more, and its bureau for storage issues
